items.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of JFK, says she has a rare terminal cancer
items.description: In an essay in The New Yorker , Tatiana Schlossberg says she has acute myeloid leukemia. She also criticized her relative, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

items.title: Researchers say a CDC website change misrepresents vaccine science
items.description: This week a CDC website briefly suggested a vaccine–autism link, prompting experts to urge the public to rely on credible medical guidance.
